summary: Provides a class that builds the MODFLOW‑6 groundwater‑to‑groundwater exchange (GWF‑GWF) package for structured grids. It examines a submodel label array together with partition information to locate neighboring cells that belong to different subdomains, then compiles the cell‑index and geometric information required for the exchange package.
business_intent: Facilitates the creation of multi‑model groundwater exchange specifications in hydrologic modeling workflows, allowing modelers to automate the setup of inter‑model flow connections across structured grid partitions.
